SA14n1150:0: yathādhimokṣadṛṣṭadharmalakṣaṇāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratipravṛttasyādhimokṣamanaskārasya prathamadvitrinavāvasthānāṃ bhāvakabodhisattvasya yathākramamutsāhanāya pratyekaṃ navabhiḥ prakārairuttarottarābhinandanaṃ stutiḥ stobhaḥ praśaṃsā ca buddhādibhiḥ kriyata ityadhimokṣamanaskārānantaraṃ prathamaṃ stutimātrāṃ nirdiśannāha |
SA14n1150:17: kṛpāpūrvakaṃ dānāśayasyādhikyena tayormadhye satkārādipuraḥsaraṃ tathāgataśarīra yo dadyāt so'
SA14n1150:22: punaraparaṃ kauśiko yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yatra yatretyādinā |
SA14n1150:23: paṭutaraśraddhendriyādiyogena pātrībhūtatvādbhājanībhūtā yatra magadhādau deśe sthitāḥ |
SA14n1150:26: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ye jambūdvīpa ityādinā |
SA14n1150:32: mumityutpāditabodhicittaṃ samāsato granthārthaśikṣaṇādgrāhayedimāṃ prajñāpāramitāmiti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
SA14n1150:39: tatra ca samprajanyena samyagupalakṣaṇatayā layauddhatyadoṣāpanayanādyathākramaṃ vineṣyatyanuneṣyati |
SA14n1150:50: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ kauśika jambūdvīpe sarvasattvāḥ |
SA14n1150:53: dvisāhasre madhyama iti hārakacatuṣṭayena yathāsaṃkhyaṃ caturthī pañcamī ṣaṣṭhī saptamī ca stutimātrā nirdiṣṭā |
SA14n1150:54: kintu sarvatra samādāpayet pratiṣṭhāpayeditiparyantanirdiṣṭapadānantaraṃ pūrvoktahārakāttat kiṃ manyasa ityādi yāvadbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavedityanuvartanīyam |
SA14n1150:56: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasra ityādinā |
SA14n1150:57: ataḥ khalu punariti daśakuśalasamādāpituḥ pratiṣṭhāpayituśca sakāśādityarthaḥ |
SA14n1150:63: cāturmahādvīpake sāhasre dvisāhasre trisāhasre ca lokadhātau sarvasattvān dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayediti hārakacatuṣṭayena yathākramaṃ dvitīyā tṛtīyā caturthī pañcamī stobhamātrā nirdiṣṭā |
SA14n1150:64: sarvatra ca hārakacatuṣṭaye pratiṣṭhāpayediti padānantaraṃ pūrvoktahārakāttat kiṃ manyasa ityārabhya yāvadbhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmityetatparyantamanuvartanīyam |
SA14n1150:68: punaraparaṃ kauśika ya ityādinā aṣṭamīṃ stobhamātrāmāha |
SA14n1150:71: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā |
SA14n1150:73: iti vacanāt pratīyamānapadārtha eva hi prajñāpāramitā kasmādupadiśyata ityabhiprāyavānāha |
SA14n1150:86: kiṃ hetukā kiṃ svarūpā ca sā yena taddhetusvabhāvaparityāgāt parihrīyata ityāha |
SA14n1150:104: dharmatātmakasya ca rūpasya kalpitarūparahitatā vināśo rūpānityatā prajñāpāramitā ityupadekṣyanti |
SA14n1150:109: yathoktena ca nirdeśena dharmadharmiṇoranirākaraṇe viparyastabhāvābhiniveśānna muktirityabhiprāyavānāha |
SA14n1150:110: na khalu punaḥ kauśika rūpavināśo rūpānityatā draṣṭavyetyādi |
SA14n1150:112: bhāvābhāvādiviparyāsābhiniveśamūlasya savāsanakleśajñeyāvaraṇasya samyak prahāṇahetutvena tathāgatatvapadaprāpaṇāt pratipattavyeti matiḥ |
SA14n1150:116: śraddhādipūrvakaṃ prajñāpāramitāpustakadānaṃ tatsandarśanādikañca sāśravaṃ tat kathaṃ pūrvakārthakāriṇaḥ sakāśāduttarārthakāriṇo bahutaraṃ puṇyamiti |
SA14n1150:120: yasmādvipulavimalānantaguṇarāśitathāgatatvādisarvāryadharmāṇāṃ jinajananyā hetutvena sutarāmeva śrotaāpattiphalamataḥ prajñāpāramitātaḥ sambhavati |
SA14n1150:122: vikalakāraṇasvabhāvatvāt śrotaāpattiphalasyānyasya ca prativiśiṣṭasvabhāvasya buddhatvāderdānādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati |
SA14n1150:124: punaraparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāstān sarvān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayedityādinā |
SA14n1150:128: punaraparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāstān sarvānanāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayedityādinā |
SA14n1150:132: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāstān sarvānarhatve pratiṣṭhāpayedityādinā |
SA14n1150:136: punaraparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāstān sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayedityādinā |
SA14n1150:140: punaraparaṃ kauśika yāvantā jambūdvīpe sattvāsteṣāmapi sarveṣāmityādinā |
SA14n1150:144: prayogamārgeṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan darśanamārgeṇa bṛddhiṃ bhāvanāmārgeṇa virūḍhiṃ bodhisattvaviśeṣamārgeṇa vipulatāṃ gatastathāgatabhūmau paripūrayiṣyati |
SA14n1150:148: nanu bodhicittotpādanapūrvakaṃ pustakadāturadhikārthakāriṇaḥ sakāśāt kevalapustakamātradātuḥ kathaṃ puṇyamahattvamiti |
SA14n1150:154: "yasmādavaivartiko bodhisattvo niyatamabhisambudhya sattvānāṃ duḥkhāntakāritvena viśiṣṭaṃ puṇyakṣetramatastasyaiva pustakadāturbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ na tu bodhicittotpādanapūrvakamaniyatagotrapudgalāya pustakadāturi"ti |
SA14n1150:158: nuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpādayedityanantaraṃ yaścānyaḥ kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitetyādigranthaḥ pūrvokta evānuvartanīyaḥ |
SA14n1150:160: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātāvityādinā tathaivātra hārakānte grantho'
SA14n1150:163: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika sāhasracūḍikāyāṃ lokadhātāvityādinā |
SA14n1150:168: punaraparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāste sarva ityādinā |
SA14n1150:171: nuśāsataśca bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ kiṃ tarhyanabhisambudhyāpīti pratipādayannāha |
SA14n1150:185: yasmāccundasya karmakāraputrasya piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya parinirvāṇākāla samaye bhagavataivoktamāgame |
SA14n1150:189: yañca piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya tathāgatottarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambuddhaḥ yañca piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ |
SA14n1150:193: nanu bhāvanābhyāsādāsannībhāve sati kathamavavādānuśāsanībhyāmāsannībhāvo nirdiśyata iti |
SA14n1150:217: tatra te stutyādaya uttarottarapuṇyamahattvasya pratipādanāttatsvabhāvatvena nirdiṣṭā yathābhūtārthādhigamamātralakṣaṇā nārthavādādirūpā yathoktaprabhedā eva pratipattavyāḥ |
SA14n1150:219: stutiḥ stobhaḥ praśaṃsā ca prajñāpāramitāṃ prati |
SA14n1150:221: evañca kṛtvā tatra tatra sūtrāntare nidāneṣu yaduktaṃ sarvabodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvabuddhastutastobhitapraśastaiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavān viharatīti tadupapannaṃ bhavati |
